txt.en: Nestled among the webs of the glass-spiders you find a brooch. It features a green leaf veined with silver. The name Geirfast is engraved in the back. You find it odd that a brooch of Lothlórien bears the name of a dwarf.
'Where did you find this? In a web in the Water-works, you say? This belonged to my great-great-great-grandfather whose name I now bear. Thank you for bringing this to me.'
You discovered a brooch of Lórien within the spiderwebs of the Water-works.
Talk to Geirfast in the Twenty-First Hall
Geirfast is in the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nThe brooch of Lórien you found is marked with the name Geirfast.
